title: Platinum Support main is searching for a team to play Tournaments
body:
Hi...

well, the title is pretty accurate, so i kinda don´t need to write it down here again, but atm i am searching for a High Gold - Platinum team to play Tournaments, Team Ranked, Clash, etc. when i got your interest (because support mains ARE kinda rare ^^) just add me ingame and we can talk/write and play a bit, when i am online again!

And yes, just in case, when you would want to ask me that, i have Discord and TS, but i prefer Discord by a lot (and i would not mind talking about the LoL ingame chat, which Rito just recently released ^^)

Greeting, Ecchi Is Healthy~
